snippet.title: Shattered | Mixed Reality Puzzle Adventure | Announce Trailer | Meta Quest 3
snippet.description:
Shattered is a new mixed reality adventure developed by PlaySide and will be published by Oculus Publishing.  

In SHATTERED, reality is just a puzzle waiting to be unraveled. Trapped in a mysterious mental health facility, your perceptions cannot be trusted.  To escape, you must turn your physical space into a labyrinth of escape rooms and manipulate objects across virtual and mixed reality to solve complex puzzles. Investigate and alter memories to bend reality itself to your will as you collect the necessary evidence to expose the secrets of Greyvale and escape to safety.  This mixed reality adventure  is coming exclusively to Meta Quest 3 and 3S in December of 2024.
